casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION DOCKET

96-1717. Pavlides v. Niles Gun Show, Inc.

Stark App. No. 1995CA00207. This cause came on for further consideration upon the motion of amicus curiae, Gun Owners Foundation, for leave to file memorandum in support of appellant’s motion for reconsideration. Whereas S.Ct.Prac.R. XI(2)(C) prohibits the filing of an untimely motion for reconsideration,

IT IS ORDERED by the court, sua sponte, that the motion be, and hereby is, stricken.
